text: Viktor Stepanovich Chernomyrdin (, 9 April 19383 November 2010) was a Russian politician. He was the first chairman of the Gazprom energy company. Chernomyrdin was the longest-serving Prime Minister of Russia serving from 1992 to 1998. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1938 births Category:2010 deaths Category:Prime Ministers of Russia Category:People from Orenburg Oblast
title: Viktor Chernomyrdin
